page.title: 08TRADE
page.content: BASILDON HAS AN IMPRESSIVE TOWN CENTRE WITH OVER 425 SHOP UNIT. A NEW COMPLEX CONTAINING 300 UNITS IS BEING BUILT, AND SHOULD OPEN IN SPTEMBER 1985. IT IS ONE OF THE PREMIER SHOPPING CENTRES IN SOUTH-EAST ESSEX, AND AFTER THE OPENING OF THE NEW COMPLEX WITH SHOPS SUCH AS C&A AND ALLDERS, IT WILL THE BE THE LARGEST SHOPPING CENTRE IN ESSEX. THE EASTGATE SHOPPING MALL OPENED IN 1981 AND PROVIDS TRAFFIC-FREE AND COVERED SHOPPPING, WITH SAVACENTRE AS ITS FOCAL POINT. ALL THE SHOPPPING AREAS IN BASILDON TOWN CENTRE ARE TRAFFIC-FREE, AND PLANS ARE WELL ADVANCED TO BUILD A PLASTIC ROOF OVER THE ENTIRE CENTRE. THIS WOULD MAKE THE THE LARGEST COVERED SHOPPING CENTRE IN THE WORLD.
